unnormalised: Hey folks, solar rooftop subsidies are finally making sense! My cousin Priya in Chennai installed hers last Diwali. She got like Rs. 50,000 off, and now her electricity bill is practically zero. Imagine that after eating a huge Onam sadhya! Heard TERI is doing good work on promoting this too. Wish more people in Delhi and other cities knew about it! Saves money and helps the environment. Win-win, right?
